remarks: An equivalence of less-than ordering and covers relation.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.)
statement:
atltcvr.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
atltcvr.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atltcvr.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atltcvr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atltcvr $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> ( P .< ( Q .\/ R ) <-> P C ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) $.
